The fact that Manaka immediately quit prostitution after realizing her conflicting feelings was already enough to make me like her. She didn't even hesitate. She thought, "This isn't for me," and just left. Truth be told, the writing is... not the best. You see your friend struggling with her self-worth and her relationship with a guy she likes, so you choose to make him have sex with a bunch of girls in front of her right after she got raped. Yeah... The writing clearly comes second here, but it's forgivable. The NTR also isn't the usual pointless garbage with the sole purpose of giving pain boners to cucks and closeted cucks. This is what I like to call "NTR as a plot device." The artist simply isn't afraid of offending the reader if it means driving the story towards a satisfying conclusion. And the conclusion is Manaka and Honma moving into a new place, away from her previous life, and living happily ever after as a married couple that will have very fulfilling love and sex lives.

I wasn't expecting the first story to have a satisfying ending. These stories usually go in one way only: Irredeemable slut loves sex, loves prostitution and doesn't care about anything other than cock, but we're supposed to like her because the Japanese are fucking simps who put women on a pedestal. Well, that wasn't the case this time. Manaka showed genuine distress over her sense of self-worth, especially after realizing that she's been hurting Honma the whole time. And when she enjoys getting raped, that's not her being the usual smooth-brained FMC with no soul. It's a combination of 1) her body not understanding the concept of consent anymore, and 2) her desire to be punished for being awful. She thinks that she might as well become a meat toilet because that's all she deserves. When was the last time I saw a FMC showing genuine human emotions like this in a hentai?
